title: 820-3330 Graphics issue
message: No liquid damage. Tested another LCD, Reballed VRam, Resoldered and replaced U8900. Just looking for confirmation its a dead GPU?

title: 820-3330 Graphics issue
message: Very well could be. Reball the GMUX just in case

title: 820-3330 Graphics issue
message: Never seen a MUX do that. If it really has been worked on that much, you can't rule out damage to the board itself. Of course, GPU highly suspect, as it damage near/around it...inspect entire board very well for missing/damaged components.

title: 820-3330 Graphics issue
message:
Can you access OSX?
If yes, switch to iGPU and see what happens...

title: 820-3330 Graphics issue
message:
Reflash BIOS with clean ME.
If still the same, then should be GPU...

BTW, external video same?
If yes, then is not GMUX.
